patient_info: Tall stature,Mitral valve prolapse,Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy,Abnormal aortic valve morphology,Mitral regurgitation,Aortic regurgitation,Tricuspid valve prolapse,Left ventricular hypertrophy,Dyspnea,Aortic root aneurysm,Kyphoscoliosis,Tachypnea,Back pain,Exercise intolerance,Tricuspid regurgitation,Heart murmur,Chest pain
golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM) with aortic valve disease (valvular atrioventricular fibrosis) and mitral regurgitation
2. Aortic valve disease (calfibrillin A G1958D mutation) with atrioventricular myopathy causing mitral regurgitation and left ventricular hypertrophy
3. Combined mitral valve prolapse syndrome (MVPS) with tricuspid valve prolapse syndrome (TACVS)
4. Kartagener syndrome (Primary ciliary dyskinesia/PACD) with aortic valve disease (calfibrillin G196A mutation), mitral regurgitation, left ventricular hypertrophy, and dyspnea
5. Marfan syndrome (Triple helix disorder/THD) with aortic valve disease (calfibrillin A605V mutation), mitral regurgitation, left ventricular hypertrophy, and chest pain
6. Pulmonary hypertension-associated mitral valve disease (mitral annular calcification) with mitral regurgitation, left ventricular hypertrophy, and dyspnea
7. Carotid-cavernous fistula (CCF) with aortic valve disease, mitral regurgitation, left ventricular hypertrophy, and chest pain
8. Mitral annular calcification (MAC) with mitral regurgitation, left ventricular hypertrophy, and dyspnea
9. Pulmonary hypertension-associated tricuspid valve disease (tricuspid annular calcification) with tricuspid regurgitation, left ventricular hypertrophy, and dyspnea
10. Combined mitral valve prolapse and tricuspid valve prolapse with left ventricular hypertrophy
